title: Religious diversity in Middle East/North Africa in 2010 , by religion
summary: This statistic shows the population of causes of deforestation in canada in 2015 . 41 percent of deforestation in canada in 2015 was caused by agriculture . deforestation is the intentional destruction of forested land for permanent reuse for agricultural , urban , industrial , or other non-forest operations .
gold: This statistic shows religious diversity in Middle East and North Africa in 2010 , by share of religious population . In 2010 , about 93 percent of population in the Middle East and North Africa were Muslims .
